guild.description:
Post your political compass test results and other political tests and discuss them here. 

Also visit +PoliticalCompassMemes

Rules: the content of this guild, as precedented by the content of this guild with its previous guildmaster, will be all content relating to the political compass and its alternatives.

title: And here I thought I was a centrist...

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
That test is so ridiculous it means nothing. But since you managed to get on the right side of the compass at all you're probably hyper free market, not centrist (that test has a *huge* libleft bias).

I made an alternative test that's probably libertarian-biased but not as bad as politicalcompass.org. Although Ruqqus itself is heavily libertarian biased too. Different concept anyway: https://crystalvulpine.github.io/PoliticalTriangle/
body_html:
That test is so ridiculous it means nothing. But since you managed to get on the right side of the compass at all you're probably hyper free market, not centrist (that test has a huge libleft bias).

I made an alternative test that's probably libertarian-biased but not as bad as politicalcompass.org. Although Ruqqus itself is heavily libertarian biased too. Different concept anyway: https://crystalvulpine.github.io/PoliticalTriangle/
